item.title: Sycophancy as compositions of Atomic Psychometric Traits
item.description: arXiv:2508.19316v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Sycophancy is a key behavioral risk in LLMs, yet is often treated as an isolated failure mode that occurs via a single causal mechanism.
